scan_table_check.description: Each Scripted REST Resource must be tested and verified through ATF tests. Hence for every Scripted REST Resource there must be an ATF test that verifies its functionality. An ATF test must exist in the same application as the Scripted REST Resource that contains the name of the Scripted REST Service and the Scripted REST Resource.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF tests for Scripted REST Resource
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Create an ATF test that checks the behavior of the Scripted REST Resource. Make sure that the name of the test starts with the application name followed by a dash then followed by the name of the Scripted REST Service Scripted REST Resource then a dash and then the name of the Scripted REST Resource.
scan_table_check.short_description: All Scripted REST Resources must be tested by a dedicated ATF test
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF tests for Scripted REST Resource
